titles: An historical account of Mr. Rogers's three years travels over England and Wales giving a true and exact description of all the chiefest cities, towns and corporations in England, Dominion of Wales, and town of Berwick upon Twede : together with the antiquities, and places of admiration, cathedrals, churches of note in any city, town or place in each county, the gentleman above-mentioned having made it his whole business (during the aforesaid time) to compleat the same in his travelling, : to which is annexed a new map of England and Wales, with the adjacent parts, containing all the cities and market towns bound in just before the title.
author: Brome, James, d. 1719.
D. J.
publisher: Printed and sold by J. Moxon and B. Beardwell ...,
notes: Imperfect: tightly bound, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  Description and travel --  Early works to 1800.
